thanks.title: Thank you
thanks.message: We got your message and will get back to you as soon as possible.

slide-2.title: GREEN SNACKS

salades.title: Fresh salads
salades.description:
At Green is better the customer finally has the choice of its ingredients!
Every day our green managers select the best fresh products.
Then it's up to you to play. All you have to do is choose, season and enjoy.

dishes.title: Hot dishes
dishes.description: Fresh and balanced, the succulent green recipes have one thing in common: they are all cooked with love with fresh products. All hot! ... and succulent!

soups.title: Soups
soups.description: MUSHROOMS - ASPARAGUS - TOMATOES ... and many more to which you add your favorite ingredients!

quiches.title: Quiches & Pies
quiches.description: It's a green "hits"! The best pies and crispy seasonal quiches fondant.

wraps.title: Green roll & Wraps
wraps.description: All fresh, prepared on the spot the Green rolls ™ and wraps leave like ... rolls!

deserts.title: Desserts & Pies
deserts.description: Yogurt, compotes and other surprises make your eyes sweet!

brunch.title: Brunch
brunch.description: At Green we come with our family on Sunday to enjoy a balanced buffet brunch

green-pass.title: Green Pass
green-pass.description:
The Green Pass card is not just a "simple" loyalty card, but first and foremost a true revolutionary payment method in the fast food sector.

It works like a prepaid card on which you credit a sum by credit card, cash or restaurant tickets! It therefore allows you to store the holdings of your restaurant vouchers (no return-money, more cash flow, less cash handling, etc.) and entitles you every week to benefits that are exclusively reserved for Green Pass members. ®:

  • Promo on favorite menus
  • Bonuses and loyalty bonuses
  • Sponsorship Bonus
  • Priority fund thanks to the Fast Green® option

And many more to discover each week ...

To get the Green Pass card, go to your Saladbar Green is better!
It's free, no registration fee, no subscription, no contract!

juice.title: fantastic fresh cold pressed juices
juice.description: Fresh fresh cold pressed fruit juice on the spot, a treasure of vitamins!

about.story:
In 2003, in New York, we discovered the concept of saladbar.
Paradoxically, it is in the country where food remains a controversial subject that was born the "green attitude" and the notion of healthy eating, fast and cheap.

Very quickly, BIG APPLE falls in love with this new concept that invades Manhattan like wildfire !

All that remained was to propose it in France, where again the phenomenon quickly became obvious :
Eating quickly does not prevent eating healthy and green!
The green revolution was on.

In 2009, thanks to its success in Paris, we decided to develop Green is better wherever it has its place, that is to say almost everywhere.
Development continues in France and internationally.
Indeed, a franchise network must evolve to adapt to the ever-changing world.

At Saladbar Green is better, we give the floor to members of the network who regularly participate in workshops that highlight the behavior of consumers ...!
Logic no?
